title: ‘Godfather of AI’ Speaks Out: AI Capable of Reason, May Seek Control
description: British-Canadian cognitive psychologist and computer scientist Geoffrey Hinton, known as the 'godfather of AI,' speaks with Nick Thompson of The Atlantic (off frame) during the Collision Tech Conference at the Enercare Centre in Toronto, Canada, on June 28, 2023. (Geoff Robins/AFP via Getty Images)

title: ANALYSIS: Trump, Other Politicos Fight for Attention in Changing Media Landscape
description: Former President Donald Trump visits the Versailles restaurant in the Little Havana neighborhood after being arraigned at the Wilkie D. Ferguson Jr. United States Federal Courthouse in Miami, Florida, on June 13, 2023. (Stephanie Keith/Getty Images)
